title: Branches of Physics Dependency Graph
description: Interactive vis-network visualization showing 11 major physics branches and 33 subbranches with their prerequisite dependencies. Users can explore how different areas of physics build upon foundational concepts like classical mechanics and electromagnetism.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: physics

vis-network
